Smoking can also cause acid to pour into your esophagus. Cut down on carbonated drinks. Don't eat at bedtime. If you go to bed soon after eating, the acid will flow into your esophagus causing, you to be up most of the night. You want to eat then do it 3-4 hours prior to. Also if I eat big meals. So I eat a few smaller ones. Fatty foods will also cause acid build up.
